name: 8-bit Office Rampage
description:
Description

Fight your way through evil office workers and security guards to reach the top floor of the office building. Find various keys and keycards to make your way through a crowded maze of locked doors and elevators. Use anything you can find as a weapon and destroy everything that gets in your way. Rampage all the way up to the top floor and get revenge on the boss.

Controls
  • Press the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to move left and right.
  • Press SPACEBAR to attack.
  • Press the UP arrow key to use objects and pick up weapons.
  • Press the DOWN arrow key to drop any weapons you are holding.
  • Press M to view the map.
  • Press ESC to pause the game.
